main event: A civilian reported seeing a disc-shaped craft about 300 ft in diameter traveling almost due north at an approximate speed of 20 mph.
interesting points: The craft was brightly lit and surrounded by a shimmering haze.
The civilian's eyes became blurred and he felt a tingling sensation as the lights around the craft dimmed.
No sound was emitted by the UFO.
Another civilian reported seeing a bright orange-colored object moving across the sky for about 15 minutes.
A 'glowing man' or 'glowing object' was seen coming out of the woods by a witness and two young boys.
sighted object: Disc-shaped craft, bright orange-colored object, glowing man/object
witnesses: Civilian, Mrs. Doris E. Beason, Mrs. Penn Hill and two young boys
